title: Tell HN: X is opening any tweet link in a webview whether you press it or not
author: stillatit
aiHeadline: X is now forcing you to view tweets in a webview, whether you like it or not—because apparently, you can't make your own choices anymore.

title: My Truck Desk
author: zdw
aiHeadline: Meet the truck desk: because working from home isn't quirky enough, now you can do it from a moving vehicle—commuting and procrastinating in one convenient package!

title: What is a manifold?
author: isaacfrond
aiHeadline: What is a manifold? Well, now you can find out, because clearly, you've been living your whole life without this knowledge and it's been a terrible burden.

title: NoLongerEvil-Thermostat – Nest Generation 1 and 2 Firmware
author: mukti
aiHeadline: NoLongerEvil-Thermostat: because your Nest thermostat needs to know it's not evil anymore—because apparently, thermostats have feelings now.

title: This Day in 1988, the Morris worm infected 10% of the Internet within 24 hours
author: canucker2016
aiHeadline: This Day in 1988: The Morris worm proved that even back then, the internet could be ruined by a single person's curiosity—and we're still dealing with the aftermath.
